articles.title: 'Parasite' director Bong greeted by applause in South Korea
articles.description: INCHEON, South Korea (AP) — Director Bong Joon-ho smiled and waved at a waiting crowd on Sunday as he arrived home in South Korea, his first trip back since he won four Oscars for his movie “Parasite,” including the award…
articles.content:
INCHEON, South Korea (AP) Director Bong Joon-ho smiled and waved at a waiting crowd on Sunday as he arrived home in South Korea, his first trip back since he won four Oscars for his movie Parasite, including the award for Best Picture.

articles.author: By MARI YAMAGUCHI Associated Press
articles.title: Americans in Japan to trade one quarantine for another
articles.description: TOKYO (AP) — Americans Cheryl and Paul Molesky are trading one coronavirus quarantine for another.
articles.content:
TOKYO (AP) Americans Cheryl and Paul Molesky are trading one coronavirus quarantine for another.
The couple from Syracuse, New York, are cutting short a 14-day quarantine on the Diamond Princess cruise ship in the port of Yokohama, near Tokyo, to be flown ba… [+3017 chars]

articles.title: Quarantine ends for Germans; Italy to fly citizens from ship
articles.description: BERLIN (AP) — More than 100 Germans evacuated from the hard-hit Chinese city of Wuhan, the epicenter of a new coronavirus outbreak, were set to end their prescribed 14-day quarantine period on Sunday.
articles.content:
BERLIN (AP) More than 100 Germans evacuated from the hard-hit Chinese city of Wuhan, the epicenter of a new coronavirus outbreak, were set to end their prescribed 14-day quarantine period on Sunday.

articles.title: Silver: NBA, USA Basketball still may play in China in 2020

articles.author: By The Associated Press
articles.title: New virus has infected more than 69,000 people globally
articles.description: A viral outbreak that began in China has infected more than 69,000 people globally. The World Health Organization has named the illness COVID-19, referring to its origin late last year and the coronavirus that causes it.
articles.content:

articles.title: China reports fall in new virus cases for 3rd straight day
articles.description: BEIJING (AP) — China reported Sunday a drop in new virus cases for the third straight day.
articles.content:
BEIJING (AP) China reported Sunday a drop in new virus cases for the third straight day.
There are 2,009 new cases in mainland China, bringing its total number of confirmed cases to 68,500, according to the country's National Health Commission.
